scripts.test: nightwatch --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter --format-options '{"colorsEnabled": true}' --format-options '{"theme": {"feature keyword":["bold","blue"],"feature name":["blue","underline"],"feature description":["blueBright"],"scenario keyword":["bold","magenta"],"scenario name":["magenta","underline"],"step keyword":["bold","green"],"step text":["greenBright","italic"]}}' --format json:./tests/reports/cucumber_report.json; node generate-reports.js;
